name: Link Media Scraper Bot
description: A Pyrogram Scraper Bot which scrapes Streamtape.com, Cyberdrop.to, Bunkr.is links.

API_ID.description: You Api id, Get it from my.telegram.org

API_HASH.description: You Api hash, Get it from my.telegram.org

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your Bot API Token, Get it from Bot Father of Telegram

LOG_CHAT_ID.description: Your chat id,  where you will be notified if the bot is up or not, Default is None

API_USERNAME.description: Your Streamtape API Username, Default is None

API_PASSWORD.description: Your Streamtape API Password, Default is None
